unnormalised: Arre, aikolai Tata Sonsak Companies Act, 2013chea Section 241 antargat notice ailya mhunn – gambhir corporate law-achem kam asa, bhai! Aashaa asa te jaldich sodoytat, 31/12 deadline poilim.
normalised: Arre, aikolam Tata Sons-ak Companies Act, don hazar ani tera-chea section donso ekchallis antargat notice ailea – gambhir corporate law vishay, bhai! Asha kortam te lokaruch sodavtat, ektees december-chea adim.
